body.name: downluxe Premium Down Feather Pillow Luxury Hotel Collection - Bed Pillow for Sleeping with Silver Piped Edges, Queen Size (20"×28", Pack of 1)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【MEDIUM FIRM SUPPORT】- Filled with 60% feathers and 40% polyester, these feather pillow inserts have soft feeling and provide medium firm support for head and neck. Feathers ensure the pillow's softness and polyester provides support, which can avoid the shortcomings of feather pillow's too soft and down alternative pillow's too hard.

【ITEM SIZE & DESIGN】- Feather pillow measures 20x28 inches. Our feather down pillow is finished with decorative silver piped edges that gives the pillow a beautiful looking and prevent feather and down from shedding.

【SOFT COVER】- Our pillow down is encased in a high-density down-proof polyester cover which is breathable and skin-friendly. Unique fabric avoids feathers poking your face and fine needle stitching ensures durability, which can offer you a comfortable sleeping experience.

【HOW TO USE】- Upon receipt, please push the down feather pillow insert in and out on all four sides and put them in a ventilated place for 1-2 days to make pillow feather return to the original shape. Bathing it in the sun for several hours is recommended for a healthier use.

【CARE INSTRUCTION】- Machine washable in cold water with gentle cycle, tumble dry low when needed. We recommend that you use a pillowcase when using down and feather pillow. Pat the pillow every day after getting up and ventilate the pillow every 3-4 weeks to keep the pillow fluffy.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice feather pillow.
reviews.reviewText: It is very similar to the feather pillows I have used my whole life.Fluffy but adjust well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and Fluffy
reviews.reviewText: Pillow is nicely filled and doesn't lose shape. Doesn't end up a flat mess. Very comfortable too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice & comfy. The silver edge is pretty amazing tbh. A bit less soft than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are GREAT
reviews.reviewText: It is worth the money not to have to sleep on a combination of plastic and toxic chemicals.I wondered why for a long time I was waking up with headaches, a red face and burning eyes.Just look at the list of potentially-toxic chemicals that make up "memory foam."Potentially Toxic Materials Used in Memory FoamCommon harmful chemicals that were historically found in memory foam mattresses include:Methylbenzene: Methylbenzene, more commonly known as toluene, is a clear liquid that occurs naturally in crude oil. Toluene is toxic when inhaled in large quantities.Formaldehyde: Formaldehyde sometimes results as a by-product of the foam manufacturing process, though this is much less common nowadays. Formaldehyde fumes can irritate the eyes, nose and mouth, and it is known to be a human carcinogen.Methylene Dianiline: Used as a reactant in the foam manufacturing process, methylene dianiline causes irritation when coming into contact with skin, and may be carcinogenic.Methylene Chloride: Formerly used as a blowing agent, this substance is a suspected carcinogen and can pose serious health risks if it comes into contact to the skin or mucous membranes.Chlorofluorocarbons: Chlorofluorocarbons were formerly used as a blowing agent, but use of these substances is now limited because of their ozone-depleting effects.Toluene is what they used to put in wite-out and it's totally toxic. Who thinks it's a good idea to sleep on something that gives off formaldehyde fumes?These pillows are not full of chemicals, they're natural, squishy and wonderful and WHAT A RELIEF. Very highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pillows are slightly flat. Not much fluffiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are honestly perfect. Exactly what I was looking for. Good quality firm but not to firm. Seems to be good quality so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product doesn’t match the description.
reviews.reviewText: Not firm, not supportive, horrible for a side sleeper, very flat and far too expensive. My neck hurts as I’m writing my review. I’ll never buy pillows online again. Pillows are something you just have to buy in person. These pillows were just another time my money was not well spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very excellent pillow, cozy. Got for visiting relatives. Highly recommend.
